category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 22 (Establishment of Safety Standards)
contents: Article 22 (Establishment of safety standards) â‘  The chairman of the board of directors must establish work standards for hazardous work that requires two people to work as a team and workers with less than 6 months of service cannot do the work alone. , a plan must be established and operated to prevent health problems for workers in abnormal climates such as cold weather and fine dust.
